name: COLOR SHOOTER: EXPLODE!
description:
This is a shooting runner with various levels where you control a ball that can bump and shoot objects of different shapes with laser gun and other different cool guns.

You need to bump or shoot the objects of the same colors and push them into the ones of a different color or just shoot the ones of different color. The ones of a different color explode when touched or shot, but be careful not to touch them with the ball directly cause it will decrease your shield! 

Reach the finish line without losing all your shield!
